Hi! I am a UX designer and HCI grad student based out of Austin, TX. I work as a research assistant at UT's Simulation and Game Applications (SAGA) Lab.
# My work
Below is some of my user experience, product design, tooling and visualization work.
Automated Fat-Finger Testing in Sketch
Detect dangerously close touch targets and visualize fat-finger error zones in your artboards; with this Sketch plugin. Experimental tooling in design!
